title: Major League Baseball : average concession stand prices 2010 to 2019
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 3 lines denoting Beer, Soft drink, and Hot dog. The y axis indicates the Concession stand prices in U.S. dollars and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Soft drink, and Hot dog are gradually increasing, Beer is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Beer, 2. Hot dog, and lastly, 3. Soft drink.
Throughout the period, Beer generally had the highest Concession stand prices in U.S. dollars relative to others with an average of 5.97, and it reached its maximum at 2012 with a value of 6.16.
After Beer, Hot dog overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 4.3, peaking at 2018.
Soft drink mostly had the least Concession stand prices in U.S. dollars with a mean value of 4.0, which peaked at 2018 with a value of 4.65.
yAxis: Concession stand prices in U.S. dollars
